metadata.name: 40,000 sq ft wall mural
metadata.description:
I am a professional muralist.

I will paint a 40,000 sq ft wall mural for the buyer of this NFT. The wall shall be of your choice and in the location of your choice, anywhere in the world. 

I will be using professional exterior weather proof wall paints to do the painting job.

I will take between 6 months to 10 months to complete the job. 

You shall suggest the design of your choice or I shall design according to a creative brief from you. 

There are no other charges involved.
